ideas.title: A weight tracker app
ideas.description: An app that accepts a set of manual entries of weight measurements taken at different dates. It can plot a graph of data.

ideas.title: A net worth calculator and tracker
ideas.description: An app that you can use to track the rise or fall of your net worth on a monthly basis. Have it send you an annual report for the previous year on the first of January each year.

ideas.title: A pixel art generator
ideas.description: An app that takes an image as input and samples the image to produce pixel art as output.
